dares: Do 20 pushups and send a video or voice note of you counting.
Send a voice note singing the chorus of your favorite song.
Text your crush 'I like you' and send a screenshot of the reaction.

Send the 10th photo in your gallery to this group.

Text your mom 'I'm getting married' and show the group her reply.
Wear your clothes inside out for the rest of the day and send a pic.
Eat a spoonful of hot sauce or mustard right now.
Send a voice note of you barking like a dog for 10 seconds.
Try to lick your elbow and send a video of the attempt.

Send a screenshot of your YouTube search history.

Drink a large glass of water in one go without stopping.
